title: HJC Zader Men's CL-MAX II Bluetooth Full Face Motorcycle Helmet - MC-1 / Small
description: Polycarbonate Shell. BlueTooth ready with an exterior module recess and interior speaker cavities (Bluetooth sold separately). Modular Touring Helmet HJ-17 QuickSlide Shield System Optically superior face shield. ACS Advanced Channeling Ventilation System. Single button flip-up chinbar/face shield. Moisture wicking removable and washable interior. DOT approved. Meets the FMVSS 218 Standard.
